Html:
Hi All,

I'm currently looking for a hosting solution that would be suitable to host the Club Starter Kit web site.

Anyone out there using a web hosting solution? any sugestion would be appreciated.

Many Thanks

Hannibal

The key is to have a host that provides "Full Trust" which is not super common.
I use ultimahosts.net to host a couple of Club Starter Kits and they have been great.
There is a tutorial on how to get a club starter kit up on Ultimahosts.net at http://www.aspstarterkit.com if you are interested.

I've just got Version 3 BETA 1 up and running at www.Zebu-Cattle-for-Sale.info, it's running in Medium Trust, and I merged it with the Classifieds Starter Kit.

It's hosted with www.Marvalus-Domains-Hosting.com, prices are great and you can publish your local database to your hosted database using the Database Publishing Wizard which provides right-click integration with Visual Studio. It's wonderful, you right click the database, chose Publish to Provider, and step through it.

Thanks for your input. I got a question regarding the SubSonic somponent. Does it need to be install on the hosting web server ? or can I just include it in the bin directory and it will work properly? any input have or how to work with the subsonic on a hosting server would be much appreciated.

Many thanks

Hannibal

Anyone has some input on how to deal with the SubSonic component on a hosting solution?

Do I need to have the hosting provider install the subsonic? or there a way to do without any intervention from the hosting solution?

many thanks

Hannibal
